entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
